question: It is a 104m long Ice-class research vessel operated by the National Institute of Ocean Technology, India. It was constructed in Italy. It consists of fully automatic diesel-electric propulsion equipped with dynamic positioning system. It is mainly used for deep sea mining. The name of the Ocean Research Vessel is _?
explanation: All given features are of ORV Sagar Nidhi. It is a 104m long ice-class research vessel operated by the National Institute of Ocean Technology, India. It was constructed in Italy. It consists of fully automatic diesel-electric propulsion equipped with the dynamic positioning system. It is mainly used for deep sea mining. This vessel is capable of carrying out geo-scientific, meteorological and oceanographic research and is designed with blue water capability with ranges of up to 19000km.
